sn35.129:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anando kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
sn35.129:1.2: Atha kho ghosito gahapati yenayasma anando tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho ghosito gahapati ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
sn35.129:1.4: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, dhatunanattam vuttam bhagavata”ti?
sn35.129:1.5: “Samvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhatu, rupa ca manapa, cakkhuvinnananca sukhavedaniyam.
sn35.129:1.7: Samvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhatu, rupa ca amanapa, cakkhuvinnananca dukkhavedaniyam.
sn35.129:1.9: Samvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhatu, rupa ca manapa upekkhavedaniya, cakkhuvinnananca adukkhamasukhavedaniyam.
sn35.129:1.11: samvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhadhatu, rasa ca manapa, jivhavinnananca sukhavedaniyam.
sn35.129:1.13: Samvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhadhatu, rasa ca amanapa, jivhavinnananca dukkhavedaniyam.
sn35.129:1.15: Samvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhadhatu, rasa ca upekkhavedaniya, jivhavinnananca adukkhamasukhavedaniyam.
sn35.129:1.17: samvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhatu, dhamma ca manapa, manovinnananca sukhavedaniyam.
sn35.129:1.19: Samvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhatu, dhamma ca amanapa, manovinnananca dukkhavedaniyam.
sn35.129:1.21: Samvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhatu, dhamma ca upekkhavedaniya, manovinnananca adukkhamasukhavedaniyam.
sn35.129:1.23: Ettavata kho, gahapati, dhatunanattam vuttam bhagavata”ti.
